Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand seek last semi-final berth; Sri Lanka's train heading towards the Champions Trophy
If New Zealand win, they move to ten points and almost certainly lock the fourth semi-final slot
Sri Lanka needs a win and inspiration, with Kusal Mendis needing to rediscover his form
New Zealand's last five completed ODIs have seen them lose four and win one
Sri Lanka's last five ODIs against New Zealand have seen them win three and lose two
Rachin Ravindra has 523 runs in this World Cup, making him the third-highest run-scorer
Kusal Mendis has averaged 15 at a strike rate of 68.18 since being named captain
New Zealand might include Kyle Jamieson or Lockie Ferguson due to Sri Lanka's weakness against short-pitched bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand won by 5 wickets with 160 balls remaining
The match took place in Bengaluru on November 9, 2023
There were concerns about rain potentially affecting the match
